tool_description:
LinkedIn profile data API provides LinkedIn profile data, **open to work** status, skills, work experience, education, courses, given & received recommendation, and last activity date, LinkedIn profile connection count, etc. as JSON response.

**Please contact us if you need a custom package**

If you need bigger packages please see our another api https://rapidapi.com/rockdevs-rockdevs-default/api/linkedin-profile-data-apis-high-capacity-limit

If you have any trouble or need more, please fe...

title: Linkedin Profile Data Api
